issue.title: [CF 1554] Trivial: Shown group sort order doesn't move Always Hide icons
issue.body:
The group sort order "Shown" is supposed to put hidden icons last but it does not do this with "Always Hide" icons, instead they stay in place and show as a gap in the toolbar. This is not a huge issue as they can be manually moved to the end of the toolbar.


> Posted by CurseForge user Pike | Imported from CurseForge issue #1554 | Raw

comments.body:
There's an "Always Hide" priority, separate from "Shown". There are reasons why you may want always-hidden icons to still be sorted.

 

However, it is a mistake that "Always Hide" isn't included in the preset for shown (or the other presets for that matter)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
